ingredientsDesc: Reagents containing：lite reagent：monoclonal mouse anti-digoxin antibody labeled with acridinium ester in protein buffered saline with sodium azide and preservatives\nsolid phase：digoxin(~2 ng/mL)covalenty coupled to paramagnetic particles in protein buffered saline with sodium azide (0.11%)and preservatives\nCalibrator B：low or high level of digoxin, FSH, total IgE, LH, LH2, prolactin, total hCG, and TSH in equine serum with preservatives and protein stabilizers
